00030 {
00031     // Forward definitions
00032     template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace> class ell_matrix;

00034     template <typename Matrix1, typename Matrix2, typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace> class hyb_matrix_view;

00125 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00126 class hyb_matrix : public detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::hyb_format>
00127 {
00128   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::hyb_format> Parent;
00129     public:
00132     template<typename MemorySpace2>
00133     struct rebind { typedef cusp::hyb_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace2> type; };
00134     
00137     typedef typename cusp::hyb_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00138 
00141     typedef typename cusp::hyb_matrix_view<typename cusp::ell_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::view,
00142                                            typename cusp::coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::view,
00143                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00144     
00147     typedef typename cusp::hyb_matrix_view<typename cusp::ell_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::const_view,
00148                                            typename cusp::coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::const_view,
00149                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> const_view;
00150     
00153     typedef cusp::ell_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace> ell_matrix_type;
00154     
00157     typedef cusp::coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace> coo_matrix_type;
00158     
00161     ell_matrix_type ell;
00162     
00165     coo_matrix_type coo;
00166 
00169     hyb_matrix() {}
00170 
00180     hyb_matrix(IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols,
00181                IndexType num_ell_entries, IndexType num_coo_entries,
00182                IndexType num_entries_per_row, IndexType alignment = 32)
00183     : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_ell_entries + num_coo_entries),
00184       ell(num_rows, num_cols, num_ell_entries, num_entries_per_row, alignment),
00185       coo(num_rows, num_cols, num_coo_entries) {}
00186 
00187     // TODO remove default alignment of 32
00188 
00193     template <typename MatrixType>
00194     hyb_matrix(const MatrixType& matrix);
00195     
00198     void resize(IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols,
00199                 IndexType num_ell_entries, IndexType num_coo_entries,
00200                 IndexType num_entries_per_row, IndexType alignment = 32)
00201     {
00202       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_ell_entries + num_coo_entries);
00203       ell.resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_ell_entries, num_entries_per_row, alignment);
00204       coo.resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_coo_entries);
00205     }
00206 
00211     void swap(hyb_matrix& matrix)
00212     {
00213       Parent::swap(matrix);
00214       ell.swap(matrix.ell);
00215       coo.swap(matrix.coo);
00216     }
00217     
00222     template <typename MatrixType>
00223     hyb_matrix& operator=(const MatrixType& matrix);
00224 }; // class hyb_matrix
00243 template <typename Matrix1,
00244           typename Matrix2,
00245           typename IndexType   = typename Matrix1::index_type,
00246           typename ValueType   = typename Matrix1::value_type,
00247           typename MemorySpace = typename cusp::minimum_space<typename Matrix1::memory_space, typename Matrix2::memory_space>::type >
00248 class hyb_matrix_view : public detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::hyb_format>
00249 {
00250   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::hyb_format> Parent;
00251   public:
00254     typedef Matrix1 ell_matrix_type;
00255     
00258     typedef Matrix2 coo_matrix_type;
00259 
00262     typedef typename cusp::hyb_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00263 
00266     typedef typename cusp::hyb_matrix_view<Matrix1, Matrix2, IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00267 
00270     ell_matrix_type ell;
00271     
00274     coo_matrix_type coo;
00275 
00278     hyb_matrix_view() {}
00279 
00280     template <typename OtherMatrix1, typename OtherMatrix2>
00281     hyb_matrix_view(OtherMatrix1& ell, OtherMatrix2& coo)
00282     : Parent(ell.num_rows, ell.num_cols, ell.num_entries + coo.num_entries), ell(ell), coo(coo) {}
00283     
00284     template <typename OtherMatrix1, typename OtherMatrix2>
00285     hyb_matrix_view(const OtherMatrix1& ell, const OtherMatrix2& coo)
00286     : Parent(ell.num_rows, ell.num_cols, ell.num_entries + coo.num_entries), ell(ell), coo(coo) {}
00287 
00288     template <typename Matrix>
00289     hyb_matrix_view(Matrix& A)
00290     : Parent(A), ell(A.ell), coo(A.coo) {}
00291     
00292     template <typename Matrix>
00293     hyb_matrix_view(const Matrix& A)
00294     : Parent(A), ell(A.ell), coo(A.coo) {}
00295 
00298     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols,
00299                 size_t num_ell_entries, size_t num_coo_entries,
00300                 size_t num_entries_per_row, size_t alignment = 32)
00301     {
00302       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_ell_entries + num_coo_entries);
00303       ell.resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_ell_entries, num_entries_per_row, alignment);
00304       coo.resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_coo_entries);
00305     }
00306 };
